nodes.text: The Sith Art chamber was located within the Temple of the Sith on Coruscant. A simple wall lay between two slanted walls lit with inset lights; the end of the hall had been decorated with large red target-like shapes. Along the hall, large bronzium beast-heads billowed smoke.
The Sith who created the mural asked his apprentice to slay him at the top of the hall so that the dark energy from the act would imbue the wall with his power.
Darth Ruyn enjoyed meditating under the mural before Darth Talon killed him.
